Name: El Pedroni
Ingredients: 30 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tequila replaces gin in this Negroni variation. Not an easy option.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Teddy Joseph, UK.
Nutrition: One serving of El Pedroni contains 178 calories
